MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L35 Prescot and WA8 Widnes, affecting properties in Cronton Road, Garnetts Lane, Stockswell Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.50am. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead lines near Lodge Lane. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8am on 16th of January 2021.
